pageContext.claim: “We've got a -- And you just hope [Biden] can keep it going, but it's not gonna go much longer. That's why crazy Nancy was trying to get the 25th amendment, so if he ever got in we'd get him out.”
pageContext.analysis: The 25th amendment lays out a constitutional process to remove a president. It is not something that lawmakers would try out on one president in an effort to prepare for the next.
